lender.name: Radulph
lender.loan_because: "be the change you wish to see in the world"
lender.occupational_info: renewable energy development/climate change

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I believe in paying it forward.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I respect the neighborhood.
lender.occupational_info: I work with students with disabilities, which impact their education; I help them gain insight into their strengths and needs, and learn self-advocacy skills.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: By showing someone you believe in them by giving them support on a credit basis you motivate them to work harder to achieve their goals.

lender.name: Julie & Jeremy
lender.loan_because: My husband, Jeremy, and I want to give people a hand up in life and we believe that this is a good way to do that.

lender.name: Karl
lender.loan_because: I would like to share God's blessings to help those who work hard.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software by day and a law student in the evening.

lender.name: Olivia & Maddie
lender.loan_because: We are blessed and want to give back!!!

lender.name: John & Cat
lender.loan_because: We loan because we feel incredibly blessed, because we have been helped by so many other people in 30 years of self-employment, and because we want to give back and also "pay it forward" in tangible ways.
lender.occupational_info: We serve as coaches for other people who want to improve themselves, their relationships, their businesses, and their contributions to humanity.

lender.name: Don
lender.loan_because: It is a way for me to make an impact in someones life. I don't have any children ... this way the world is my child ,thus fulfilling a calling.
lender.occupational_info: I fix computers that others break!

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: If the world can cooperate in this way, we will all live better and live in peace. I wish you success with your project and will keep you in my thoughts.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, but I am very interested in women's projects and educational scholarships for women.

lender.name: Andrew Wilson
lender.loan_because: It is my way of anonymously helping someone I don't know and may never ever meet and the small gift from me is able to make such a big impact on someome else.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help others. Such a small token on my part can make such a difference in someone else's life - I am glad to be a part of this circle.

lender.name: sciencegirl
lender.loan_because: We can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I take complex scientific and medical information and translate it into plain language.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: my brother got me started and now I just can't stop!

lender.name: rachael
lender.loan_because: i can.
lender.occupational_info:
Creating a demand economy for a better world by partnering with positive impact companies and non profits.
I design all aspects of a company's visual system, from a logo to packaging, to catalogs and websites.

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: I would like to assist people in accomplishing their goals and dreams. In participating in Kiva, I wish to help improve infrustructure in countries of need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a pharmaceutical manufacture where we make drugs for various rare genetic diseases. I oversee the raw materials that goes into our manufacturing process and therefore I value quality of products very highly.

lender.name: Jennifer Whitley
lender.loan_because: I can, and I care. Like the entrepreneurs we lend to, we can together make the world a better place.

lender.name: Rebel
lender.loan_because: the people who saved me from the pound are always talking about Fair Trade, equality, and helping others. So...I thought I'd join them!
lender.occupational_info: Because I'm a dog...I sleep most of the day. Unless squirrels get into the back yard, then I try to get them. When other dogs in the neighborhood walk by, I bark at them. The kids in the house like to play ball, so they are ok to keep around.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.occupational_info: economics (study of markets)

lender.name: Ayesha Anne
lender.loan_because: I believe in building sustainable independence. I know a small amount of money can go a long long way!

lender.name: Sean & Karen
lender.loan_because: Life is not fair. This is an opportunity for us to help level the playing field. We believe that supporting a middle class in other countries will help to stabilize the political unrest in the world.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I want to give back

lender.name: John
lender.occupational_info: I teach college students about the science of biology.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to the world outside my local sphere but I have very little time to do so in person. Kiva loans are a great way to give something back for the many blessings I have in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I work to improve the materials that are used to build many products. In particular, I work with metals that can be used for microelectronics.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: the world will be a better place if we encourage each other to blossom as God intended.

lender.name: Mackenzie Mackling
lender.loan_because: I loan to people around the world who need loans for their agriculture related businesses because I believe Agriculture is the bomb

lender.name: Tom & Virginia
lender.loan_because: We want to help other people have a better life for themselves and their community.

lender.name: Reb
lender.loan_because: Helping people to help themselves or better those who can't is what we all should do.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the best job for them.

lender.name: Mike & Teresa
lender.loan_because: In memory of my sister, Doreen.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I believe it is joyful to help others on their road to success. A favorite quote: Give me a fish and I eat for a day. Teach me to fish and I eat for a lifetime.

lender.name: Tabitha Group
lender.loan_because: We love Jesus and share His commitment to compassion, mercy and justice.
lender.occupational_info: We invest primarily in the work of women entrepreneurs in Africa to help them establish and sustain economic independence. Our group is named after an industrious woman who cared about others, especially widows. You can read about her in the Bible (Acts 9:36-41).

lender.loan_because: I believe in people.
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are hurting, to be happier and have better relationships.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: Help reduce poverty
lender.occupational_info: Try to help people stay healthy by creating more access to healthy food and physical activity

lender.loan_because: I'm independant and I want to help other women become independant as well.

lender.name: Johanna
lender.loan_because: Help people to a good start.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: Access to capital is critical to build wealth. For countries without ready access, Kiva is a godsend.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies address problems using technology.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone's life.

lender.name: Jeffery
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about helping people build business.
lender.occupational_info: I like to help artists build businesses for themselves.

lender.name: B. Little
lender.loan_because: If we do not who will?

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: if you give a man a fish, he will eat a meal. If you teach a man to fish, he will have meals for the rest of his life.

lender.name: Mitch
lender.occupational_info: I work with immigrants and refugees to help them find employment in Canada.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs help sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to high school students.

lender.name: Kim & Joffrey
lender.loan_because: We believe the world can be a fairer place.
lender.occupational_info: Kim teaches gymnastics to children Joffrey manages computers, the way they are used and architects the way they are connected together.

lender.name: Pola
lender.loan_because: Una amiga me obsequio el certificado para que pueda ser dado a alguna persona en necesidad. Como peruana deseo ayudar a las mujeres peruanas que tienen que trabajar mucho para mantener a sus familias.
lender.occupational_info: Trabaje como profesora de educaion inicial por mas de 15 aos aqui en Canada, luego coordine programas para el cuidado de nios mientras que sus mamas, nuevas inmigrantes, estudiaban. Ahora ya estoy retirada pero me dedico a cuidar a mi nieto que tiene 16 meses.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: We are all on this planet together and we need to help and take care of each other. Kiva is a great use of technology and it is fun to see the results.

lender.name: Daryl and Shirley
lender.loan_because: We have been blessed enough to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Shirley teaches piano and Daryl helps children with special needs.

lender.name: Joy & Keith
lender.occupational_info: Joy is a psychology fellow, and Keith provides IT support.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Diane & her kids
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Volunteering work mostly to help children have a better life

lender.name: Jef Fowler
lender.loan_because:
I have been privileged to live in a western country born into a safe, loving environment where a decent standard of living and opportunity is taken for granted.
Although I have squandered much of my time on this earth there are others far more in need of what I had.
Micro-loans are a way to enable others to profit from my misspent time on the planet.
lender.occupational_info:
Erratic.
Laboratory technician (pathology and commercial QA), taxi driver, Technology (electronics, IT, programming), 'finding myself', collecting unemployment benefits.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I like to see someone succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I help US citizens finance their home with a mortgage loan. I help the broker submit loan applications for the bank.

lender.name: Keith & Eileen
lender.loan_because: We are blessed

lender.name: Julie and Erin
lender.loan_because: ...we are so grateful for all that we have, including amazing friends who give us Kiva gift certificates!

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: it feels good. I believe in taking action at a personal level, rather than relying on government to do "good".

lender.name: Daven
lender.loan_because: I can. I believe that helping others is an honor, as well as an obligation. I only hope that I'm able to make a change in someones life for the better.
lender.occupational_info: I care for the sick, when they are unable to care for themselves.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: I can. At least a little. And someone needs it more than I do.

lender.name: Bill M.
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Read and write.

lender.name: Brian Peiris
lender.loan_because:
As soon as a understood the concept behind Kiva it struck me as a simple and beautiful solution to help in humanity's struggle with poverty and in-equality, one of those "why didn't I think of that!" ideas. It's always better to help someone help themselves rather than simply sustain their quality of life (or lack thereof).
In my mind Kiva provides a service that the world has always needed: it gives everyday citizens of developed nations the ability to truly connect with those in developing nations, allowing us make a meaningful difference in the world.
These qualities are often lost in the act of donating to the large and multi-national entities such as UNICEF and the Red Cross. Although they are important in their own right, our minds have been increasingly desensitized to their causes. Kiva, on the other hand, brings a tangible face back to our disconnected world.
lender.occupational_info: I create software and websites that help people use computers in a variety of helpful and productive ways.

lender.name: Blair
lender.occupational_info: City Planner / Urban Designer

lender.name: LuAnn
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world grow in a better direction.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in poverty! :-)

lender.occupation: child of God, Mother, Wife, Sister, Friend
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: My "work" for the occupation I listed above is self explanatory. Otherwise, I am employed as a defense attorney.

lender.occupational_info: I am a spiritual guide for people that want to live life at a more awakened level.

lender.name: Brian

The whole Pay It Forward concept.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I believe that economic freedom goes hand in hand with political and religious freedom.

lender.name: Maggie
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. For those to whom much has been given, much is expected. A quien le ha sido dado mucho, mucho se demandar de l.
lender.occupational_info: I was born in Germany. My dad was career Air Force so we moved a lot . The good news is that I got to live in some wonderful places, like Spain. I now teach Spanish at a technical community college. / Yo nac en Alemania. Mi pap era militar y nos mudamos varias veces. Lo bueno es que he podido vivir en unos lugares maravillosos, como Espaa (Torrejon). Hoy en da enseo espaol en una universidad tcnica de dos aos.

lender.name: Coby

lender.name: Ellen

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: We all need help at some time in our lives. Helping others is payback for those who haved helped us in the past.

lender.name: Kyle
